text: Garabed Sarkis "Garo" Yepremian (June 2, 1944 - May 15, 2015) was an American football placekicker. He played in the National Football League for the Detroit Lions, Miami Dolphins, New Orleans Saints, and Tampa Bay Buccaneers from 1966 to 1981. Yepremian was born in Larnaca, southern Cyprus to Armenian parents. He died from brain cancer on May 15, 2015 in Media, Pennsylvania, aged 70. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American football placekickers Category:Cancer deaths in Pennsylvania Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Detroit Lions players Category:Miami Dolphins players Category:New Orleans Saints players Category:Tampa Bay Buccaneers players
title: Garo Yepremian
